com.socrata.api

Class SodaWorkflow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.socrata.api.SodaWorkflow
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SodaDdl

    public class SodaWorkflow
extends Object
    Implements the methods important to using the Soda workflow. At a high level, these are the APIs around publishing and determining if processes like geocoding are still going on. To find out more about the publishing cycle, look at http://dev.socrata.com/publishers/workflow However, for frequent updates or large datasets, it is often better to us the Soda2Producer API if you can, because publishing operations are expensive.

    • Method Detail

      • newWorkflow

        public static final SodaWorkflow newWorkflow(String url,
                       String userName,
                       String password,
                       String token)
        Create a new SodaWorkflow object, using the supplied credentials for authentication.
        Parameters:
        url - the base URL for the SODA2 domain to access.
        userName - user name to log in as
        password - password to log in with
        token - the App Token to use for authorization and usage tracking. If this is null, no value will be sent.
        Returns:
        fully configured SodaWorkflow

      • createWorkingCopy

        public DatasetInfo createWorkingCopy(String datasetId)
                              throws SodaError,
                                     InterruptedException
        Creates a working copy for the specified dataset ID. This copy can have any schema changes made to it, as well as replace/append operations. The resulting dataset will not be available to other users until it is published.
        Parameters:
        datasetId - the id of the dataset.
        Returns:
        reference to the new working copy of this dataset
        Throws:
        SodaError
        InterruptedException

      • makePublic

        public void makePublic(String datasetId)
                throws SodaError,
                       InterruptedException
        Makes a dataset public. After calling this on a dataset, it will be visible to any user, meaning any use will have teh "viewer" role for this dataset.
        Parameters:
        datasetId - id of the dataset to make public.
        Throws:
        SodaError
        InterruptedException

      • makePrivate

        public void makePrivate(String datasetId)
                 throws SodaError,
                        InterruptedException
        Makes a dataset private, so it can only be viewed by users that it has been shared with, or people who are admins on the site.
        Parameters:
        datasetId - id of the dataset
        Throws:
        SodaError
        InterruptedException

      • waitForPendingGeocoding

        public void waitForPendingGeocoding(String datasetId)
                             throws InterruptedException,
                                    SodaError
        Waits for pending geocodes to be finished. A publish won't work until all active geocoding requests are handled.
        Parameters:
        datasetId - id of the dataset to check for outstanding geocodes.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        SodaError

        Parameters:

        Returns:
